name: Whiteside
description:
"Reality is that which, when you stop beliving in it, doesn't go away" Whiteside is a first-person survival horror game. As an investigator of the Common European Asylum System, explore an island where they keep the mentally insane that are beyond help, uncover the truth, but dont belive everything.

Setting:

On an island that is now used as a mental/prison facility, part prison part asylum terror and horror awaits at Whiteside Asylum. An old hospital for the criminally insane who are hopelessly past rehabilitation. The island was deemed an ideal location for a prison/asylum. It is assumed no prisoner could ever escape or surive the cold oceon that surrounds it.

Acting as a investigatior of the Common European Asylum System (CEAS) it's your duty to inspect the asylum to make sure it up to standards. Up on arrival straight away things seem off, and what you discover is only the beginning.

Features:
  • Survival horror: You will have to use all your wits to try and seek the truth but also survive in this horror slasher.

  • Enemy AI: Enemies will not be predictable there is no set path way, they can come anywhere and at any moment you will feel very unsafe

  • Graphics: Whiteside utilizes the unreal engine 4 and has made use of nearly all the engines features, including real time volumetric lighting, high textures, pushing the bounderies of what computers can do to give of a truley AAA quality in the graphics department

  • Rich Story and multiple endings: Whiteside focuses on story as much as it does on graphics and performance, in this rich story telling game the player has choices that can be made which will effect how the story ends, not only that but enviroments have different entrences and exists meaning there can be multiple ways around the enviroment.

  • Random Jump Scares: Whiteside has hand crafted jumpscares made to scare the player but only a few will generate during each playthrough giving the player more reasons not to play again
